description:
Serve as the Subject Matter Expert for various teams to provide support for A/B test design and analysis, as well as data-driven insights through ad-hoc analyses, presentations, and automated reports and dashboards. Mentor junior data scientists on customer behavior and business performance. Oversee junior data scientist in the building of models to better understand the value and churn behavior of our users. Evaluate data patterns and communicate insights and opportunities with executives and other internal teams to reshape our current understanding of customer behavior using advanced analytical technique. Perform ongoing and ad-hoc analyses to evaluate A/B tests, build reporting infrastructure, and provide analytics insights to optimize on app’s Trust and Safety environment and authentication funnels.
